original_text: And Jacob rose up early in the morning, and took the stone that he had put for his pillows, and set it up for a pillar, and poured oil upon the top of it.
korean_text: 야곱이 아침에 일찍이 일어나 베개로 삼았던 돌을 가져다가 기둥으로 세우고 그 위에 기름을 붓고

sentences.original_text: And Jacob rose up early in the morning
and took the stone that he had put for his pillows
and set it up for a pillar
and poured oil upon the top of it
